column5: Just wanted to thank Jason publicly, you're a good man bud! Jason had asked me if I'd try out his handpoured steelhead baits and offer him some feedback. Naturally I was eager to oblige  . So about an hour ago purolator drops off a package for me:       There's absolutely no doubt they'll work great! Thanks again bud, you're a true inovator  .  Mike
Those eggs look AWESOME. Great job Jason.
Yeah, those eggs looks real awesome, good work Jason.
Lookin forward to the report on how those plastic eggs work...i already know how well the pinkies do,...
